text: Ej kasone, ki ʙa Allohu Rasulas imon ovardaed, agar padaronu ʙarodaronaton dust dorand, ki kufrro ʙa coi imon intixoʙ kunand, onhoro dust magired va sirru asrori musulmononro ʙa onon fos nakuned. Modome, ki onon ʙar aqidai kufrason hastand. Pas har kas az sumo dustason ʙidorad, hamono nofarmonʙardorii Alloh kardaast va az sitamkoron xohad ʙud
